name: aws-python-flask-api-project
description: Example of a Python Flask API service with traditional Serverless Framework

scripts.install: poetry config virtualenvs.in-project true && poetry env remove --all && pyenv local 3.9 && yarn update
scripts.update: poetry install --no-root && poetry run ggshield auth login && poetry run pre-commit install
scripts.deploy: poetry export -f requirements.txt > requirements.txt --without-hashes && serverless deploy
